price: (19) But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.[1928]
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا هُمۡ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡمَشۡـَٔمَةِ
footnotes: [1928]- Or "the companions of ill fortune," i.e., those who receive their records in their left hands and proceed to Hell.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna kafarū biāyātinā hum aṣḥābu al-mashamati
